values:
Hello, LJ Folks. This blog is coming straight to you from the Whitcomb Computer Lab located at Hiram College in scenic Hiram, OH.
This will be the last blog I create from Hiram, OH.
Folks, I believe I have made a huge life decision. It's not final, but I think it will be soon. 
I am putting this here as opposed to Facebook because I do not want certain people (roommate, or just people at Hiram) to read this before my decision is final. I don't necessarily need reassurance in my decision, but most people who know me very well (i.e. YOU GUYS) know I have a great aversion to both decision making and change. Which is why this is a huge, huge deal.
I believe I am going to transfer.
I have been completely unhappy with my life at Hiram College since the day it began.
I have not made a best friend, or any "real" friends for that matter.
Sure, I have very friendly acquaintances.
But you know what?
I could walk away from this place tomorrow and never, ever look back. And not be overwhelmingly sad, either.
And that's just not the way I want to feel about my school. 
I love school. I love learning. That's why I want to be a teacher. But I have absolutely no attachment to Hiram. As a matter of fact, I don't particularly like Hiram. I would not recommend Hiram.
I am slightly happier at Hiram this year, but it is not for a good reason. The reason is mostly because I have a car and I can escape. Seriously. I'm happier this year because I can get the hell out of here. Not a good way to feel. 
This place is in the freaking MIDDLE OF NOWHERE. Rural like you could not even imagine. I have to drive 25 minutes if I want Taco Bell, alright? I have no idea why in the world I ever thought I would be happy here when I love my conveniences at home so much.
Hiram is for some people. In fact, Hiram is for the vast majority of the 1100 students that attend Hiram. Most of them love it. I feel no ties and no attachment. I want to love where I go and have pride in it. I want to feel like the school I go to is my home and not want to leave there every second of every day.
Frankly, it comes down to happiness. I am not happy here. As a matter of fact, I have been miserable nearly every second I have been at Hiram in my time here. I didn't tell anyone really, but my considerations of transferring started back in March. I applied to other schools back then but decided to give Hiram another chance. It was the wrong choice. 
So where will I end up? I'm leaning heavily towards Kent. If anyone doesn't know, my college decision my senior year came down to Hiram or Kent. Once again, I chose wrong. However, I'm also looking into BW, which would be obviously closer to the small school feel I'm used to, although the small school feel is part of my turnoff to Hiram, I suppose.
I know I have more to say on this issue. Maybe comments can prompt some of what I know I want to get out? Yes well, comments appreciated.

INSTRUCTIONS:
write twelve things,
intended to different people.
never tell which one is to who.

some really obvious. some not so much.


1. i'm sorry you feel we have nothing in common anymore. i'm also sorry you feel it's all my fault. it's not. we both have contributed, both by changing and neglecting to change. you are still someone i love so much and i want to be friends with you forever, but we just need to accept each other as we are.

2. you are still one of the best people to be around. you're so kind, and i wish i hung out with you more. we had our fun times. then we grew apart. (naturally?) you're just fun. i don't give you enough credit.

3. i don't know who i'd be without you and your comic relief. you've kept me from going insane many times. i'd love to go to school w/ you next year, sadly there are other factors =( you are a true friend and i'm glad i know you as well as i do.

4. i miss you. insanely. you're truly the most fun person i have ever met. i love how we can not talk for months and then get together and be BFF again. i just wish there wasn't those periods of months in which we dont talk. hope you're having fun w/ the nuns!

5. i hate how you've changed. you think you're some ghandi-like wonderful human being. you're not. you ditch people who have stuck by you for years because of your own petty little problems. please stop being so fake. i can't stand it.

6. i'm sorry things turned out the way they did, seriously. i still think you are very fun and talented. but your head is too big. you think you're everything. you're not. i really can't deal w/ someone so cocky. it's okay to feel like you're doing well at something, but please realize you are not god's gift to the world. maybe some day things will work out.

7. sometimes i'm a bitch to you. sometimes you annoy me soo bad. but yet, you are my best friend in the entire world. i've never met anyone so genuine and caring. you've been there for me ALWAYS. never once did i have a problem that you wouldnt listen to. im forever thankful for who you are, who you always were, and who im sure you always will be.

8. frankly, i don't care about you anymore. you're the one who's isolated yourself from everyone, and yet you want to turn it around on all of us and say its our faults?? im sorry,no. you're the one who wants to be off in your own little world, never showing up to things people are nice enough to plan and invite you to. your problem at this point, not mine.

9. i wish you didnt always revert back to your old ways. i thought you changed. you really havent. i thought you would have so much more pride for yourself. you dont. please give yourself a chance. you're so much more than you let yourself be.

10. you're an inspiration to me. im sure you dont realize it. its not like we talk all that much. but you are. you did something i'd never be able to do. you overcame your fears and went for your dream. YOU'RE AWESOME.

11. why are you the way you are? you've truly ruined my life. everything i had going for me was torn down by you. i dont get it. you have so many problems you wont own up to. you're going to lead a sad life if you dont change. notice how we ALL left you?? everywhere was better than being w/ you. i hate you for the things you've done. it's all out of spite.

12. i'll always be there. i miss you. i love you. theres so much to say. im sad that all this stuff in my life happened and i cant be there with you. you're always my best friend. always. from babies to adults. my applesauce buddy.

tom tagged me for this 'naming 7 songs im really into' thing...so im updated simply for that reason. i would give you updates on my life while i was at it, but now's not the time. maybe soon if you really want me to. lol. anyway, here's 7 songs im really into right now:
1. I'm Free/Heaven Help Me--Footloose Original Broadway Cast
2. Anything But Mine--Kenny Chesney
3. Jesus Take The Wheel--Carrie Underwood
4. Honkytonk Badonkadonk--Trace Adkins (its just so funny!)
5. What Was I Thinkin'?--Dierks Bentley
6. Something To Be Proud Of--Montgomery Gentry
7. Kerosene--Miranda Lambert
as you can see, im into all that lovely country stuff...and footloose lol....but i have no idea who to tag now!!! umm, has kelly done this? kelly? hm. well kelly, if you havent done this, do it. but i think you have. but i dont remember reading it!!! haha, and um...whoever hasnt done it that wants to!

HAPPY BIRTHDAY BETH!!!! i love you and miss you and hope you have a wonderful day. you're 17 so now you can... go see a rated R movie =) hope you get everything you wish for and... COME BACK TO PARMA!!!

i hate my life.
that's all.

HASNT ANYONE ELSE FINISHED THE BOOK?? AND YES, I FINALLY UPDATED AFTER LIKE 6 MONTHS JUST TO SAY THIS!!! AUGHHH IM DYING I NEED TO TALK ABOUT THE BOOK AND I THINK IM THE ONLY ONE THAT FINISHED IT THE DAY IT CAME OUT!!!

i did not go to school/the pep rally today. but im almost alright w/ that. cuz last night i got to do something much cooler.
i went to see MOVIN' OUT last night which is a "musical" i guess, except its all billy joel music. if you do not know who billy joel is you are either a. a big loser b. not my friend c. not my brother, sister, or anyone else who has my parents for parents or d. not a past or present student of mr saban. anyway, it was AWESOME. it was the best thing ive ever seen in my entire life!!!! it was soooooooo good. and we got really lucky, cuz you know how for a broadway show theres the people who do it on broadway and then theres the traveling group? well the lead vocalist on broadway, michael cavanaugh, just happens to be from middleburg heights and decided to take a leave from broadway so he could come here and do the show!! so we got the broadway voice w/o even being on broadway!! and as a side note, this guy also happens to be a member of my church and he came there to sing. being sick, i missed it. grr. but anyway, back to the show. so i got there and i figured the show was gonna be like, the guy sings a billy joel song, and then theres a scene w/ dialogue and whatnot, and then theres another song that leads into the next scene, etc. it was definitely NOT like that!! there was no dialogue at all, which at first i was worried about. but the lyrics and the dancing told the story good enough!! everything went along perfectly. the story was soooo good too. it was about how theres this group of friends: Brenda and Eddie (who are the prom king and queen but they break up), James and Judy (who are gonna get married), and Tony (who gets together w/ Brenda). well the guys get drafted to vietnam (scene: The Sky Falls. music: We Didn't Start the Fire, and it was such a cool version of it!!). while in vietnam, James gets killed, and Eddie and Tony get to come home. They're both really messed up when they come back. Tony keeps pushing Brenda away because he cant deal w/ everything thats happened. Eddie blames himself for James' death and starts using drugs. Then Eddie has this nightmare where he is back in Vietnam, and he is being led through the dream by Judy. Goodnight Saigon was playing, and the scene went sooo amazing w/ the music. At the part where its like "We would all go down together" Eddie reaches the part in the dream where James dies and Eddie just falls down next to him. Then in the end of the song all the other people fighting get shot at and fall over. it was such a good scene. Eddie sees Judy in the park the next day and kind of asks for her forgiveness, and when he receives it he "attains grace" (good music medley goes here). in the end they all reunite, tony and brenda get back together, etc. And then if you were smart enough to not get up and leave michael cavanaugh sang "Cleveland State of Mind" (new york state of mind). but these dancers were AMAZING. i couldnt believe it. my fave dancer was Eddie, and the weird thing is is that he was literally the understudy for the understudy for Eddie!! he was the best one though. i cant believe there were people better than him. he did a pirouette and got around SEVEN times. i counted. and the girl who played brenda looked like a brunette erika rylow, and she was in the ensemble on broadway. 
so me and my mom went to like 5 stores looking for the soundtrack of course. what losers we are. 
i feel better. i think my dad might let me go to sarah's party for a couple hours.

Gretchen Weiners

Which Mean Girl are you?

summary of bad mood:
1. human beings suck.
2. $90 a month is not worth it to be sick all the time.
3. printers officially suck also.
ok, so we all know about my getting out of the driveway problems, correct?? well, we've reached a new plateau here. 
i was backing out today, trying to get to katie moss's house, and i was also trying to stay off the neighbor's grass for once. well, i guess i started going on MY grass instead and ended up w/ my left front wheel on my treelawn in a foot of snow...STUCK. i couldnt get out!! i was officially stuck in the snow. i did what i thought i should do, which is call my dad to help me, stay in the car, and turn my hazard lights or w/e they're called on. people suck. i was out there for a half hour, and a hundred cars musta gone by. and NO ONE stopped to help me or even ask if i needed help. and there were people who lived on my street who were just going home, not even going anywhere, who wouldnt stop and help me. there was one, single, solitary person who offered and that was zack starkey. i dont even know him but i know he goes to our school and i also know its ridiculous that adults call kids disrespectful when 99 cars w/ adults in them went by, and the one car that stopped had a kid in it. i told him he didnt need to help since my dad was coming though. a neighbor saw me about 20 minutes after that and helped me out. it just took some creative turning of the wheel on my part, and some wiggling of the car on his part. right after i got out my dad came, and he drove me to katies on account of i really am sick of driving after all of my fiascos (fiascoes? nah, fiascos. hmm...i dunno, help me out!). then i got this wave of sickness and found myself over the toilet nearly puking, so for the second week in a row i couldnt go to dance. i was gonna go to jazz, but i just didnt feel up to it. so then i go to finish my english project, and my ink wont work in my computer!!! its coming out weird, i cant explain it, but i hope if my mom writes a note mrs gausman will give me a little extension because its really not my fault and im gonna have to have my stepdad come this weekend to fix it for me. so im not in a great mood.

not only do i like billy joel AND know that the 43rd word of "we didnt start the fire" is EISENHOWER (or possibly vaccine, if u count H-Bomb as 2 words...) but i realized that i may just make the same stupid mistakes he does. and as this may be a stupid mistake, it was done completely sober, as was billy joel's. yes, i ran into my house w/ my car. call me brilliant. call me billy joel, as i said. call me what you will. but nonetheless, i have no mirror on my car and must pay $100 towards a new one. and no one ever tell my dad!! i wonder if they'll sell MY dirt on eBay...i would be honored. i think it makes it worse that it was MY house, considering i know my house is there. i thought i did, at least. but there was just this dead 'clunk' and my mirror went all over the place. THANKS SARAH ITS ALL UR FAULT UR ABSOLUTELY RIGHT IF I DIDNT HAVE TO PICK U UP THIS NEVER WOULD'VE HAPPENED!!!! just kidding. me and my mom laugh about it though, thank god. she calls me "Miss HitTheHouse". and ironically enough, at church the day i told her, our pastor was telling us this story about how he borrowed his friends car and backed it into a pole and how forgiving his friend was...so i could tell my dad about this and only have to pay $40, but i'd rather pay 100 and not have my dad watch me like a hawk every minute of the day. my mom thinks so too. plus she says this will teach me the responsibilities of having a car. but my mom thinks they can have it done same day, which is wednesday. w00t!!
i havent studied yet...all the things i DONT know for chem are on my cheat sheet...so to be quite honest theres not much to study. band-pointless. french-know it. its the english Fahrenheit 451 and vocab stuff, and all of Alg II that im gonna have a problem w/. history-im screwed!! im just not soaking up anything in that class. i take the notes, i do half the work (lol), but im totally not getting anything out of it. i wont until we get at least into WWI. i love mr white but for some reason im not taking anything out of his class. so im tres screwed on that midterm...
i wanna do that 'styles for shelley' thing as long as i get my car back by thursday. i just dont know what i'd get done. maybe i'd just get my whole head dyed. no clue. but i wanna do it cuz i feel really sorry for that girl. 
anyway, those were my updates for the day. hope they were tres enjoyable.
-BeAdZ-

im baaaack. arent y'all just the most thrilled y'all ever was??
hmm lets run thru the highlights of the last month and what...6 days? 
who cares when i got my license today!!! whoo hoo!!! -does got my license dance- 
im quite excited. 'tis amazing. i drove natalee to dance and parked in the "crooked spots"! and what was it natalee...i was like crooked parkly or something...i dunno u messed it up tho. 
we had to 'freestyle' in dance today and i just went up there and did crazy shit and everyone laughed, but hey, that was the point. 
umm...do i need a monologue to try out for the play? and uhh...where do i get one??? sarah, natalee, anyone???
my life is freakin boring...there was something else i wanted to say in here, i know it...
ooh i wanna do beths movie thinger!!
The Movie Meme
1. Pick one dozen movies that are special to you.
2. Pick a few lines of dialogue.
3. As people guess the film, strike out that entry.
4. After the film is guessed, explain why that movie made the list
and since i cant do the cool little 'cut' thing or w/e the hell its called, since im computer-retarded and dont have the stuff for it, im gonna type it right here and u can scroll.
1. "I sure love peas"
"Don't eat too many...you might turn into one."
2. "If you're from Africa, why are you white?"
3. "Hi, I'm Tom!"
4. "Everytime a bell rings an angel gets his wings."
5. "It's a farce." (i dont know if its the exact line, but its the gist of it.)
6. "Did you know the concorde gets you there in half the time?"
7. "I broke the fast thingy!"
8. "I have nipples, Greg. Could you milk me?"
9. "It's a liger. It's basically my favorite animal."
10. "I wear women's underwear." "It's a thong!"
11. "Mysterious shadowy figure..."
12. "We need a witness to our lives. There's a billion people on the planet...I mean, what does any one life really mean? But in a marriage, you're promising to care about everything. The good things, the bad things, the terrible things, the mundane things...all of it, all of the time, every day. You're saying 'Your life will not go unnoticed because I will notice it. Your life will not go un-witnessed because I will be your witness'."

GOOD LUCK!! most are really easy i know...but im excited that i finally wrote an entry AND came up w/ 12 movies i could think of lines to. so please comment back and guess!!
hey guys im just talking talkin to rob on the phone. so i just thought i'd say that since i told him i would. lol. so anyway, im just bored!!! whee haaaa...anyway, have a good day y'all!!!

yeah i know i havent updated in a bit...thought it would be cool to let u all dwell on that amazing story!!
last thurs. was my b-day...i got a car!!! w00t. 
so umm...brandon and lauren are going out!!! hahahahaha. just makes me wanna shit myself. they dont know anything about each other!! literally!!! they dont even have each others numbers!!! come on, everyone has brandons number, i swear!! if lauren knew half of how brandon was, she wouldnt go near him. even her friends say so. he only asked her out cuz he thinks shes 'hott' or whatever, and she probably only said yes so as not to hurt his feelings. but i guess they were both at the swim meet and she wouldnt say a word to him! not even hi! and when he tried to hug her she pushed him away! all i gotta say is he made his choice...and thank god it wasnt me cuz lauren is in for a bit of time in hell w/ him. she'll probably be scared to break up w/ him if she wants to, cuz what if the psycho starts cutting himself again? oh but wait, she doesnt know about that cuz she doesnt know anything about him!!! im sorry, but it pisses me off that he couldnt go out w/ me, but he can go out w/ a freshman he doesnt know!!! argh.
hey guys just wanna let u know for the next week or so i honestly dont think im gonna feel like updating so yeah...bye.

so yesterday was the OSU field trip. there were a lot of farm animals along the way, including sheep w/ green paint on them or something. green x's. of course there was drama, when isnt there drama? brandon threw all his words around at everyone, not taking a breath to even say something nice to anyone. hes joking, but he just overdoes it and it pisses me off. omg!!! hoopy is sooooo annoying!!! i seriously wanted to kill him the whole time!!! he was just driving me crazy! i couldnt stand him yesterday. the bus was sooo dead. on the way there when brandon was sitting in the back he was sleeping, and megan was like, "this bus sucks and its all brandons fault." so then on the way home, hoopy's sitting by erika (hmm...) so brandon goes all the way up front so we're all mad again, cuz now its really dead in the back. so we had to make our own fun while everyone else was sleeping on the way there, and watching ghostbusters on the way back. on the way there, they handed out gummi bears in this big bag, and we were all scared to reach in there cuz we didnt know where everyones hands had been. which got us on a conversation about this girl w/ 13 cats that doesnt shave or something, and i found out that im 'not worthy of a normal conversation'. also, it seems to be a general consensus that a. im the smallest person in the band and b. many people hate me, and that ones because 100% of the people voting agreed w/ that. the people voting: hoopy and brandon. megan says 'you can so tell he likes you.' and im just like 'holy shit, wouldnt that be grand?' it would be if he wasnt always a jerk. the concert was pretty good, the best part was the beatles medley. miss fenton (im sorry, i dont know her new name) was probably going nuts w/ my horrible singing of these beatles songs. we ate at this mall place that had absolutely no mcdonalds or burger king or anything like that in their food court. and no subway. but what the hell, they had Le Petit Bistro. umm, yeah, cuz i really need french fast food. the ride home i listened to a lot of music, and i got called a banshee a lot. and we kept yelling out to Row 6 and Row 4. lol. cuz of kristens secret haha. sorry, i didnt mean to laugh!! so i got home, went right to work and heard that scott peterson was guilty!!! yay!!! haha you asshole i hope you die!!! you deserve it! you killed someone you were supposed to love forever and you killed an innocent little baby in the process!!! i hope you burn in hell.
:D
so now im gonna go clean my room and then im off to my dads house for the rest of the weekend!

I'm depressed

why is YOUR livejournal annoying?
brought to you by Quizilla hahahahaha this is sooo true!!!

isnt it amazing how one day im 'swooning' over someone and the next day im like "what an asshole"? my theory on life is that life's 'charge' must be neutral. if u have a good day, u have to have a bad day to make up for it. so i get to school. the second i walk in the doors i say to myself, "you idiot, you forgot your skirt." so i was also thinkin, "hmm...should i just leave cuz i might have time, or should i go to the office?" i decided to go to the office. so mrs bombalicki's calling my house and no one is picking up. and shes just like, "we can wait for your mom to call back." and its 7:45, pictures are at 8, i really cant wait. so im getting really pissed and she can tell. shes like, "dont cry!" im like wtf..."im not crying im just really pissed off cuz i was gonna just go home cuz school hasnt started yet, i wasnt even gonna come down here. plus its not like my mom is going to be like, 'no, my daughter cant walk the block home to get her skirt'." so mrs b was like, "fine, go ahead, but i didnt tell you to go." so i just left school w/o a pass and came back w/o a pass and made it just in time for the picture. well becca asked what happened and why i was pissed off at mrs b or something so i started telling her and 'bobby'-haha-decides to go, "are you complaining again? i never complain." so i started to laugh and i was like, "yeah, cuz we're always hearing about how good ur life is, right?" hes like, "i never say anything until people are bugging me for 10 minutes asking whats wrong..."-this is the point where i just stop paying attention- it just pisses me off cuz i would like to know WHAT I DID to make him A.ignore me. B.say something to me once in awhile.(if this happens, its never anything nice). C.when i tell him im sorry for things i said, he just hugs me and doesnt say anything about the shit he said. D.deny that hes doing this all because of 'the note' and i cant try to talk to him about it cuz then im just being retarded about things, he hasnt done anything wrong, what am i talking about i shouldnt have wrote the note, and then he either A. turns around and talks to other people (what else is new?) or B. stomps off. akjfdklakfjhasdkfaskdhfakjfkajd grrrr............................

the funny thing is, im actually a lot like that fraggle, Wembley! 
today was actually okay!! guys, for the first time in a long time i came home smiling. then i looked at my room and said, "oh crap, i gotta clean that."
i got 5th chair in wind ensemble!!! not gonna lie, i wanted 4th, but its becca in front of me so thats fine w/ me!!! if it was someone else i'd probably challenge, but i dont feel like im better than becca or that becca's really better than me, we're about the same so its cool.
sarah's in wind ensemble!! yaaaay.
and then after school i made him smile :-D or i like to think i did. maybe he was just smiling, but he doesnt smile much. i asked him if he was going to OSU, even though i knew he was. just sparking conversation. but he smiled. and thats great. and for the first time in awhile my day was actually OKAY!!!

You are: Wembley - The Indecisive Wembley Fraggle has never been good at deciding. In
fact, "to wemble" is a useful
Fragglish word meaning "to go back and
forth from one thing to another without
deciding on anything." Wembley usually is
wembling about whether to stand or lie down or
look right or left or straight ahead. In the
morning, he wembles about which shirt to wear
though he only has two and they're both exactly
alike. Part of the reason Wembley has such a hard time
making decisions is that he is genuinely eager
to please. So he doesn't like to disagree or
decide something which might make someone
unhappy - especially if that someone is Red,
Mokey, Boober, or Gobo, Wembley's best friends.
Gobo is Wembley's hero, and if Wembley were
better at deciding, he might decide to be like
Gobo some day. In the meantime, Wembley is very
good at being Wembley which means he's a
cheerful, agreeable, easy-going Fraggle to have
for a friend.

Which Character from Fraggle Rock are You?

i went to the eye doctor this morning and i need glasses!!! grr. i need them for distance stuff, like seeing the board and driving. im only upset because every pair of glasses i've ever tried on i've looked terrible in! oohhh well...
so the lists went up for chairs yesterday, and even though i havent auditioned yet it provided me w/ some useful information. such as first chair in wind ensemble is a junior, followed by 4 freshmen!!! i say if i beat 2 of the freshmen thats good, so i have to be better than kayleigh jennings and alex mamone. im doubting i'll be as good as either of the wetula twins, but i'd prefer not to be last chair. so maybe i'll be 4th and becca will be last!!! lol. juuust kidding becca. haha and sarah might be in wind ensemble!! thats so funny cuz she wanted to be a 2nd clarinet in concert band!!! oh well, at least she'll realize that shes better than she thought and that she can play music she didnt think she could play. which would work even if she wasnt in w/e, but was a 1st clarinet in concert band, cuz she didnt think she could play that music either. either way, shes gonna have to play stuff she didnt think she could play. i just wanna be in w/e soooooooooo bad....but i know katie, who's first chair, is gonna be really happy cuz she thought one or both of the wetula's was gonna beat her. and btw, the wetula's are nice girls, not depressed like me and moss thought. i think they're all right. 
now i have more make-up work to do and i have to clean my room. plus im technically grounded from the computer so im leaving now!!

hello!!! im in english again...theres only a couple minutes left...just thought i'd let you all know where i am! and thats english!! whoo-hoo!!! i finished typing my paragraph thingies for our presentation so here i am, trying not to get caught! but i have nothing else to do so i better not get in trouble if i do get caught! anyway teach says i better sign off my computer, so bye y'all!!!

so im sitting in english class right now. totally being bored. i have no idea what we're supposed to be doing. KAT SAYS HI! anyway, im so lost at the moment. kat and jeff are sitting next to me and they are not helping me out!! garsh. and the substitute teacher is watching everyone like a hawk so its a tiny bit hard to type. so i got sick and threw up this morning. it was not cute. but i had to go to school anyway. we voted for quentyn for president today at lunch and they didnt announce it!! i was upset. he probably got almost as many votes as ralph nader! but i hate school augh!!! i really wanna be back in florida...and of course my moms mad at me...story time!!
so we go trick-or-treating last night. the group consisted of me, natalee, sarah, kelly, sophia, katie moss, quentyn, and rob eurle. halfway through t-o-t, natalee and rob decide to run away!!! which is really retarded considering natalee invited everyone to come over her house afterwards. what else is retarded is that natalee just decided to "like" rob cuz u know how she is w/ "liking" people. the first guy she sees and all of a sudden she "likes" him. yeah so that means she should run off w/ him in the dark while leaving the rest of the group behind!!! especially when theres someone else who has a thing for rob too. so she just pissed me off. then my mom calls and goes, "what are you doing? natalee's mom told me that a group of u decided to just go run off to katie moss's house....!" fuck that shit. im so happy natalee's parents think shes the little angel when shes the one who fucked everything up. and i dont care if i get angry, because natalee pulls shit like this all the time w/ me and i think its time that me and her just go our separate ways because i dont know how much longer i can put up w/ her shit!

hello world!!! im back from the great land of orlando, florida and ready to share some swell moments w/ y'all!!!
day one: magic kingdom. highlights: space mountain, splash mountain. dinner: california grill on the 15th floor of the contemporary resort. got "beef" aka steak. about the size of carrie cerino's. "i paid $27 for a big mac?"
day two: epcot. highlights: mission space, test track, and FRANCE!!! i got to eat dinner at "france" in the lands omg it was the best food i eeevvveeerrrr had!!! soooo yummmy! i <3 the french!
day three: animal kingdom/magic kingdom. no matter what those disney people say, animal kingdom is totally a zoo!! they are such liars. went to magic kingdom again to catch up on the things we missed.
day four: mgm/lands at epcot. highlights: tower of terror!!! best ride...and rock 'n' roller coaster is good too. dinner: picked at things from different stands at the lands.
day five: typhoon lagoon. water park!! yeah...but i was alone the whole time. sad. dinner: fulton's crab house. yummm...crab legs, baby!
day six: mgm. highlights: tower of terror and rock 'n' roller coaster again. and the beauty and the beast show!!! aww...dinner: room service pizza, very yum.
day seven: pool/lands at epcot. highlights: meeting *tyler* at the pool. tyler=very cute boy from alabama. he was older though...a freshmen in college, but he looked a lot younger. and he talked to me first which made me feel good...but just a question, whenever i meet a guy that actually talks to me, why do they have to live somewhere like ALABAMA or even better SCOTLAND? why not parma ohio???? grrr...and i called katie moss and we talked for nearly an hour about senior show. aww...im sad i missed it! dinner: coral reef restaurant. good fish!
another thing i learned from this vacation is that i hate kids!!! if an explanation for this is necessary i shall give it to you some other time.
im happy to be back in parma, guys!!! i missed u all soooo much!!!! but i also miss the 90 degree sunny weather!!
just nerves. had to type it. plane. aaah. sooo scared....i love u all and i will miss u over the next week!!! i <3 u!!!

TOP REASONS WHY GOD MUST HAVE SET A TERRIBLE CURSE UPON MY MISERABLE EXISTENCE:

2. mrs nicholson told me that since im going on vacation right before the end of 1st quarter, im missing 300 points next week that i cant make up when i get back cuz grades are due. so either i finish 300 points worth of work in the next day or i get a 0 out of 300 on my report card. how nice of her, huh?

4. he wont talk to me unless i force him to. i wish i never felt anything for him. i wish he would just get away and i wouldnt have to look at him ever again, because i cant deal w/ all his shit. he doesnt even know hes pulling shit, im sure, but he is to me.
5. my cable internet is completely fucked up and it has fucked up my entire computer also. i cant do anything, im amazed im typing in here but i wouldnt be surprised if it didnt work. no one at cox knows how to fix it. so im getting pissed.
im telling u right now, something good better happen at the game friday or im done. w/ everything. i swear to god. and i mean w/ everything. i look forward to games to cheer me up but if it doesnt, je suis fini. i am dead.

first off, let me just say that my last entry was not made to confuse people. it was made to let out my feelings. im sorry for confusion, but maybe some of u figured out what i meant by the happenings at lunch today.
speaking of lunch, i hope quentyn's not BLIND, sarah! u eye-poker! just kidding. 
sigh. 
so here i am, in another dilemma. what else is new w/ me, huh? quentyn says i should tell him. i say i dont want my tiny little heart broken into a million bitty pieces. im scared of rejection and i dont wanna embarrass myself. the odds are against me. quentyn says they are not and i am assuming. im sorry if im the kind of person that assumes the worst. i guess quentyn just assumes the best. but he's wrong and im right. so ha. 
today in band was funny. doug put on andy blackburn's goofy little hat thing...he looked funny. and sarah fell. i wish i woulda saw it so i coulda laughed. juuuust kidding. 
in history we made mr white sing to mike trompak like a pirate. it was funny. benze was the parrot.
at lunch the reese's machine was almost broken!!! but dont worry, guys, i got my reese's. 
in english we have to make comic strips. mines called "kaylyn and elli's trip to....THE MALL!" its about buying hair dye and PUNGENT! yeah...
then i stayed after school talking to katie and quentyn for like 20 minutes and my mom got all worried (of course) and called the house like a billion times. oh well. i didnt have enough energy to care cuz i wasted it all on my stupid tears. 
so then i left my house at like 4:30 to go copy my flute music for my lesson, then i had my lesson, got out of there at like 10 after 6, went to driving school, got out of there at 9:30, came home and i still havent eaten anything since lunch today!!!! my mom wont be home till after 11 but shes bringing me food. but i am sooo hungry!!! 
btw, driving school is sooooo boring!!!! aaaaah!!!

yeah so today at lunch i told quentyn he could ask katie whats up w/ me. so he did. and she told. and now im scared!!!! seriously omg i havent told like most people...oh well they've probably figured it out. even though when they thought it was true it probably wasnt. but now it is. quentyn said he has it under control. do i want it under quentyns control? if im gonna say anything i think i wanna say it myself. i think. i dunno...i've never done it before! the thought of it gets me so scared! im second guessing myself...i dunno if quentyn should know. but he does so no point in dwelling on it. now every time i see quentyn talking to him im gonna freak out though. yeah, i definitely wanna say something myself. i think. aaah. no, i need to do it myself. quentyn might be upset that he cant do it though. lol. but then im a chicken if i dont do it myself. oh well, at least im not a stalker like natalee. anyway, like i said i havent told most people what im talking about so dont be upset if u have no idea what i meant in this entire entry. u'll find out eventually!!!

WHY CAN'T I BE FRUSTRATING BUT YOU CAN!!!!! AUGH YOU ARE RUINING ME!!!!!!!!!!!!!
now that ive got that out...
hmm...so yesterday was the football game vs. medina that should've been a landslide victory for us, instead it was a landslide loss. what was it? 34-7? dude NORMANDY beat BRECKSVILLE by that amount. when u barely beat north royalton and u get ur butt kicked by medina, u stink. period. u stink. so the game was....ok the game sucked. just the whole thing. then after was the party. me and julie serenaded each other with hits such as "from this moment on" "baby one more time" and "did i shave my legs for this?" i wasnt really having great fun after that cuz then i just got in one of my moods...i dont mean to get moody, but theres always these things, ok theres always these people, that factor into it and just piss me off and sometimes i dont even know why i bother!!! 
so i got home and in the middle of the night i threw up. which is really funny cuz i wanted to play hookie today and i didnt have to cuz i actually got sick. even though when i called work christina says in her little accusing bitchy tone "what? u got sick from yesterday till today??" and i was like "yeah i got sick in the middle of the night" "well, u've done this before (meaning ive called off last minute before) and i guess i'll let it slide." fact of the matter is, i've never called off. ever. the only times ive been taken off at all is when they messed up the scheduling, like put me on a weekend i was w/ my dad. other than that, there was the one time when i called a week ahead of time to ask them if one day i could get off at 3 instead of 4 because of the swim banquet. i fucking hate christina. shes such a fake bitch. like, she says everything in this fake nice tone but shes constantly being a bitch. i cannot fucking wait till spring so i have a fucking excuse to quit.
i think im just gonna have to get up and do the frustrated dance. its very fitting at the moment. peace out.

so today was neoea day and we had no school! yay! so i woke up and procrastinated for awhile cuz i had to clean my room. i did maybe 1/4 of my cleaning then i went to dee's w/ katie. amanda w/ the excellent hair was there. we had a good time, especially when we watched salad fingers!!! hahaha..."milford cubicle" "fancy seeing you here, hubert cumberdale" "i like it when the red water comes out" "i am here to enquire about ur spoons" anywho, we also watched the retarded animals thing! "d is for lysdexia!" "e is for...e is for pants." we also listened to a lot of music and we looked through an old year book and found "miz" from the real world. 'twas a good time. until i went to the bathroom and weighed myself. i got on the scale and it said 108 so i was really mad. then dee was like "the scales broken." and i was like "well i hope it weighs light!" and dee was like "well lets go see." and she weighed herself and she goes, "it weighs about 5 pounds heavy." so yeah...that means im back down to 103 and im the sickly looking anorexic girl once again. isnt this just a wonderful life i have??????

see that statement above? deep down in my tiny little pumping heart i believe it to be true. things arent quite going my way. im not sure why, to be honest. its just not happening for me. schools ok, except for a few little minor details. such as CONSTANT REMINDERS...so today in math natalee took a quick drink of her water and mr marcinowski told her not to...yeah so in the end natalee got written up and a detention and stuff all cuz she took a sip and someone told mr m. to write her up!!! so did katie cuz she called him a jerk...it was so ridiculous. then lets see...lunch was fun. we played candyland. i totally won. ok i totally won after i cheated a little. ok i cheated a lot. quentyn and rob sat with us. i helped rob w/ his spanish homework even though i take french. and again, i did not "level" with quentyn. quentyn's one of the people i cant "level" w/ at the moment. oh, sigh, if they only knew, huh? then i had english and we played literary terms bingo. it was pretty fun, even if i was only 2 things off of filling up my whole board for bingo and jeff klemm beat me for the second time. jerk. wait, i better not say that, i might get written up. when i got home i sat around. then my dad got me and we ate wendy's and i went to sarahs. me and sarah looked through the eighth grade yearbook and we saw all the freshmen when they were in seventh grade. some of them (i.e. tim leo) looked so funny. then we jetted off to dance, which, as always, was a total thrill. ballet is not that bad. im not that good, but its not that bad. jazz is fine. "carwash" was playing...it made me wanna get up and shake my booty. we were also listening to some weird japanese stuff that sounded like spanish. lol. i got home, washed up a bit, and then i talked to natalee. she called zak and they had a good conversation, better than sarah and "cody's" in 8th grade or w/e. he seems like a nice kid. not as silent as i thought. then i called my brother to wish him a happy b-day. hes 25 now. then i came upstairs and no ones online. so thats life i guess.

hello children. so today was one of those days where deep inside people are getting on my nerves, but i just smile and say to myself, "let it go." which doesnt happen often, so i hope u all took advantage of it. i know my mom did at dinner today, but we wont get into that because then some people might think my moms way and...yeah...maybe kelly knows what i mean??? so i'll get into another conversation me and my mom had. it was about people with crappy lives and angry people. i told my mom i was one of the angry people. she told me she could never live with an angry person like my sister ever again and that i couldnt either, could i? i was kinda like...i dunno...i love my sister! lol. so me and kelly had a conversation about things today and she actually kind of cleared up the thing ive been pondering, and u people are probably sitting here going, "what were u pondering???" but if u really wanna know u can ask me :-D kelly gave me insight into the ways other people think and i totally got what she was saying. so maybe i'll just lay off a little...? i dunno. me and her were also talking about if i ever could date brandon cuz for some reason thats an issue at stake here and i really dont know why people are so curious about it cuz its really nothing. and she was like, "what qualities does he have that would make u wanna date him?" and i was like, "i DONT wanna date him." and she goes, "yeah but what dateable qualities does he have?" me-"umm....hes a nice guy." kelly-"paletta's a nice guy...that doesnt mean i wanna date him." me-"exactly." so kelly may have let me see the other ways of thinking, but i also think some people arent trusting some of the statements im making...im sorry the STATEMENT im making so just believe me guys, jesus, cuz this is what pisses me off. and trust me on this too-u dont want me to be pissed off!
did i talk about moss's beautiful book she made me in here yet? it was the nicest thing anyone ever did for me. it made me cry. its this book of all these cute little phrases and pictures and things and i adore it as i adore moss! 
first ballet class today!! it wasnt that bad. i was the worst one in there but by my own personal standards i wasnt terrible. i liked it better than jazz tonight, w/ that evil lady who made us do crunches the whole time. wtf, this is dance, not dry land training. u evil whore.
i wasnt in band today cuz i had an orthodontist appt. and i realized how much fun band is! its my favorite class of the day! its the only one where u can talk like the whole time and only get yelled at some of the time. unless ur benze, in which case u get yelled at all the time. me and sarah realized tonight that the elyria game is away, so it should be a fun bus ride on the way out there...well, as long as im on the good bus :-D which this time moss isnt on mine!! i wanna cry my BEADY little eyes out...haha such a play on my "name". im hilarious. 
in chem today quentyn kept tapping this girl krissy's computer screen and he was pissing her off so she was like, "who the hell are you?!?!?!" i laughed. 
note to katie neylon- i need a more dependable paper flower. it kept breaking. so i gave it to brandon. so ur making me a new one.
in closing, im honest, im truthful, and i hate to lie so believe every fucking word i say.

well here i am again kids! arent you thrilled?? yes, i know you are. so twas homecoming weekend this past weekend! lets just say things might not have gone quite as planned! but we'll start at the beginning...kind of. dinner was fun, we all sang happy birthday to some random lady...i hope she appreciated it, cuz not anyone can get me to sing. my lasagna was delicious, and as i hear the steak was glorious. the dance was kind of boring, but what did i expect? we went to hannah's after and it was really nice cuz she bought pie and pop and sloppy joes. that was fun too...except cory wasnt talking so hmm...i started to think he was mad about something or mad at me but i didnt know why. so the rest of the girls were over on the couch and stuff and i felt left out and everything so i just talked to quentyn and brandon who both made me laugh very much so i ended up having a good time. cory seemed pissed in the car though, and when we got to my house i had to carry my dress, my purse, my 2 cameras, my food, and my shoes to the house and he didnt offer to help!! so i knew he was pissed but i didnt know what about. so i got to school monday and i saw mike in the hall and heres the conversation in general...mike-"i forgot to ask how things went w/ cory" me-"i think hes mad at me" mike-"he thinks u hate him" me-"i dont hate him, i just dont like him in that way" mike-"he thinks u dont like him cuz u like brandon" i gave him the "ur a psycho" look and asked if he was serious...he said he was dead serious. so i talked to katie and she said i didnt do anything that would give cory that impression. so i thought about it, couldnt figure it out. i went to school today and i was talking to ashley loeffler in health and she was like, "how are things w/ cory" and i was like "he thinks i like brandon" and she goes "yeah i know he was talking to eric online and eric asked about it and eric was like was kaylyn being mean or something? and cory was like no she was just being blunt and i think she likes brandon george..." so i talked to brandon after school and lets just say he was no help to my situation. lol. but then hannah was like "DO u like brandon?" and im just like "holy hell, what am i doing thats making everyone think i like him????" so im very confused right now...what else is new! and im also crying cuz this song makes me cry lol.

im so depressed. i dont know why. nothing particularly bad happened. well i guess it kinda did. im just depressed cuz when im at school im around people and im all happy then i come home and im just pissed. fuck this shit!!!!!!! can u tell im pissed?
so the bonfire was a thrill last night. i try to think of it and be happy cuz it was a fun time. lets see...we paraded around the block, played for like 10 minutes there, and then just stayed for kicks. lets see what we did...well we did a lot of singing, such as "her name is natalee (music thing) she has blonde hair (music) she likes to party (music) in zack mikers underwear" and that got annoying. then i stole quentyns bandana and he stole my brush...then i wanted my brush back. then i decided to steal hats. i asked nate and he said i couldnt have his. what an ass, huh? so then i asked brandon, he said no cuz "bad things happen when other people wear the sombrero." haha, whatever!! cuz katie moss took that biotch right off his head and i ran w/ it. hells yeah.then me and all my little friends stood around and talked an laugh and we just had fun. and tomorrows the pep rally so that makes me happy. and a practice at byers field! for w/e reason i love practices @ byers. so im excited.
BUT IM STILL DEPRESSED.

wheee haa. hows the world for everyone today? well my day was un-grand. my week has been un-grand. heck, im having a BAD YEAR *snicker snicker* lets see whats happened to me that was important in the last month since i wrote in here..hmm...well i went to school! and i have better teachers than last year. and i met all the *awesome* new freshmen in band *snicker snicker* (sorry, i'll stop snickering). and then...err...i...hmm...geez im boring! well i got asked to homecoming *cheer cheer* and i got a B- on my math test *score* oh and a couple weeks ago i forgot to rotate during the patriot :x loser. anyway, my life, as i said, is as boring as pure crap, so im just gonna stop typing. *kiss kiss*
p.s. and my subject up there? well use ur own imagination and u might be able to figure out who/what/where that is...heh natalee rocks.

so tonight was the fateful night of dance registration. i kind of knew what was coming, but i thought i would be able to turn it down. i thought i would be able to avoid it. but alas, i could not. i was planning on going up there, signing up for my two regular classes and then another jazz class, but obviously things cannot be that easy. and so, and mind you not because i want to be, i am now a ballerina. yes, i was told i HAD to take ballet. or else it was two classes and thats it. and i also wasnt completely fond of bridget tonight, cuz lets just say she was not necessarily boosting my spirits. she basically just told me that im there to goof off, sarah is there to be a professional, and i would be fine taking two classes. boy, let me tell you that really boosts my confidence going into these classes where i will inevitably be the worst person and have no idea what im doing. plus, its now $100 a month, and we DEFINITELY do not have that kind of money. i mean, my mom spent $150 on me today, $40 for the fixing of my flute, and $110 for dance. in this part of our lives, my mom and i do not have very much money. and maybe i should just say this here since only a few people read this and i've only told one person. basically my mom and i are only going to have about half the money we used to have because my mom and jerry are getting a divorce. now i havent told anyone this except one person, so please no one freak out on me. but i feel terrible and i have a feeling im going to get so frustrated and get so guilty about these ballet and jazz classes that i'll end up dropping them. i have so much going on in my head. i dont wanna spend this money that we dont have. im gonna have to be working all the time and probably paying for some of this and i have no idea what to do. my mom started crying cuz shes really stressed out cuz her divorce is going to be final on tuesday. and i feel stressed out for contributing to her stress cuz im making her spend money on my dance, which bridget made me feel pretty crappy at anyway. maybe i shouldnt dance at all, never do anything for myself, and sit around on my butt. i would like that.

and how could i forget (another drumroll please) MY TWO NEW *STARTING LINE* SHIRTS! woooeeee!! it was a thrill seeing them, although the one is like a dress on me cuz its a medium. although, seeing the small in the other one made me realize a small wasnt much better. but i was all excited so thanks natalee for informing me there was ONE there. haha so i picked up the one, and the band shirts were buy one get one half off, so im searching around for another one and i cant find a band i liked enough to get a shirt of. and me and natalee are just going "man, its too bad they dont have another starting line shirt" and LOL. theres one right above the other one so we're just a couple of blind tards. and then we saw nicole bretz and i felt bad for her cuz she got her wisdom teeth out. ouch. anyway, thats all now, and FYI i bought 3 other shirts too.

hello world. hows it goin? well im doin ok here. today was a day like any other. a day when i woke up, ate a cookie and a push-up, and went to pick out a locker (1773 RULES!). i got home, and soon after i got my hair cut and highlighted. soon after that, i picked up my good friend natalee bielcassarino and we went off to the mall together. alrighty, so we're sitting in the food court, im eating my mcdonalds, shes watching me. and this kid goes by, and i whisper to natalee, "is that geremy?" and i meant geremy w/ the long last name that i dont feel like typing out that went to padua. and so she yells his name and he looks. so then he walks by and natalee goes "hi geremy!" and he just said this very vague "hi." but natalee's tale of events is a little different. she says she didnt say anything but he said very ecstatically, "hi natalee!!" and she goes, "oh, hi geremy." which is definitely not what happened but i guess natalee has some kind of terrible memory problem. she musta been thinking of some other time cuz i have no idea what she was talking about. so later me and natalee are walking around and we saw him again, this time w/ (drumroll please.......) MY BEST FRIEND!! yay!! and dan mcwilliams (was that him? i think. who cares i dont like him much anyway.). so geremy asks if i wanna buy a gold card. i dont. but i feel guilty cuz i know i have like $50 sitting in my purse so i say okay. and on comes the stampede. everyone is doing what they can to buy my gold card. dan puts his arm around me. erik is shoving the gold card in my face. but the winner is GEREMY cuz he actually asked me first. so i wasted $10 on this piece of plastic but oh well, i get free pretzels. and i supported my fellow redman in the struggle to raise money in this time of failing levies (is that the plural of levy? it was my guess). and so ends another exciting day in the life of kaylyn marie, and i hope u all enjoyed it very much. THE END.

so here i am, sunday night, bored as bored can be. michael phelps will NOT be breaking mark spitz's gold medal record as i saw on ESPN a while ago w/o even seeing the event. so i watched a couple LLWS regional final games...the ones where Redmond, Washington and Thousand Oaks, California won. then i saw on the results thing on ESPN that a team from maryland or something won the mid-atlantic regional. pardon me if im incorrect. so last night me and my mom had nothing to do. we decided to go to the indians game and we got our tix right before the game sold out. which is soooo lucky for me cuz guess who i saw when i got there??? MY BEST FRIEND! i almost peed. i had wondered why he never gave me a call or anything. i mean, we never got together once this summer! i was hoping we coulda gone shopping for shoes or something. sad. i miss him. hehehe. so we have band pics tomorrow. still havent found my spats and gloves and whatever else we need. oh well. and i also really dont feel like walking all the way around the school which takes like 15 mins carrying all the crap i need. then tuesday im working at noon and i have band till 11:30 but my mom wont be home and i have to take a bus and theres no way i can walk home, change, walk to the bus stop and catch a bus, and have that bus get me to work all in a half hour. not gonna happen. so im in a dilemma and i dont know what to do. oh well. i need to stop stressing for today i guess. cuz i got paid $15.75 for standing around drinking pop and talking about what kind of wedding im gonna have and how people everywhere else call pop "soda". and then i went to the swimming banquet where i got a medium shirt instead of a large!!! yay!!! but only cuz i traded, not cuz my coach actually gave me the right size. and i ate a cookie. and everyone liked my hair! even though it was the same way i always have it. now natalee's not picking up her phone even though she told me to call her back and augh!!!! alright, im going.

THE WORLD IS LONELY WITHOUT MEGAN KLUBNIK (cuz now i have no flute friends, ahem--kelly and becca!!!!!!)
just thought i'd let everyone know.
so today was the the infamous first day of band. i got to leave after 2 hours...same w/ tomorrow. i think this year is like Year of the Doors or something cuz we have like 4 Doors' songs. and i only know one. we also have blink 182's "All the Small Things" which i dont see how its that song cuz i tried to play it and the only part that actually sounded like the song was the "na na na na na na na na na" part. and then, of course, there's "Stacy's Mom". didnt brendan always sing that? too bad he's not here anymore. i like stacy's mom. i mean, the song. its waaaaay easier than "The Patriot"!!!! that was difficult and the only person getting it was piccolo katie. the freshman girl next to me probably thinks im a terrible flute player. in that case she better get her facts straight :D. so then everyone is freaking out cuz theres supposedly no *QUADS* (and yes, i will write it like that every time). and im trying to tell people that doug (dug? heh.) is sitting on the floor w/ *QUADS*. of course, no one understands me, im just a stupid bead. or maybe they're stupid...other things. the thing was, it was pretty obvious there were *QUADS*, cuz they play in every measure that we're not playing in that war dance song. even after that song moss starts freaking out thinking theres no *QUADS*. of course, there really is no *QUADS* without dave schenk playing them in his rolled up pants. its definitely not the same. and so begins another exciting year as a bando...

so i was driving home from flute lessons w/ mom and that song "eve of destruction" came on the radio. and i was like awww....saban! and then i was like awww...school! and then i was like awww...school w/o saban! and it was a sad moment. and i realized that the guy who sings that song, barry mcguire or whatever, he has a really terrible voice. and that got me into thinking how people get famous. like how milli vanilli put out that album where none of it was really them singing, and everyone who bought the album got validated 3 bucks cuz they were ripped off. and then people who are famous off of their siblings. kelly stated, and i agree w/ this, that u cant help who ur siblings are. but aaron carter? come on. nick carter's not even any good, so u think his mini-me is going to be? uhh...no! ashlee simpson, i actually like her songs but i dont think she has a good voice. i can put up w/ the mediocrity of her voice just because i like the songs and i like the fact that she co-wrote all of them. i think she would be much cooler if she played guitar though. i mean, i like her better than avril, who's just a whiny brat (i apologize to any avril fans). and god save me, hilary duff. if she could sing instead of just talking the songs, i might give her credit. and she actually says her music is "rock" and "hard edge". shoot me right now, please! and then theres haylie...getting famous off her crap sister. and to think this whole entry started w/ a thought about saban...

so i went to see "little black book" w/ natalee tonight. it was pretty good. "john lennon always said life only happens when you're changing plans." "but he got shot." lol natalee. there was actually a twist in the movie -gasp- so my day turned out better than i thought. me and sarah chilled earlier...as usual i had a great time w/ my favorite twin sister :-D and then me and natalee had fun listening to her message about egg rolls. it was funny. anyway...i love you all and i hope u have sweet dreams of scottish boys and orange chicken.

im really bored today. my mom wants me to spend the day outside. i kinda wanna go to the mall and waste money. i feel bad cuz i was supposed to call kelly yesterday but i had to look something up for my mom and it got to late and i wanted to go to practice w/ her but my mom couldnt take home anyway. i can already tell this isnt going to be a great day. my horoscope only said 3 stars! and then oh yay! tomorrow i have an orthodontist appt. wednesday i have to work AND i have band so figure that one out, same w/ thursday. sunday i have to work AND i have a banquet so figure that out too. this is gonna be a pretty shitty week. oh and hey did u guys hear about that ethiopian chick that came here for the children's games and now shes trying to defect here and she ran away and stuff and the ethiopian team is leaving today and stuff and they dont know where she is? she probably wants to stay here on account of we have food and ethiopia doesnt.
